name: SEO Cleanup
tag_list: seo, sem, search-engine-optimization, seo-consultancy, website-design, website-development, seo-outsourcing, outsourcing
overview:
SEO Cleanup focuses on providing consultancy services to website owners to improve the performance of their websites.

SEO Cleanup is a division of Niyati Technologies, an India based company with over 12 years of expertise in website design, web application development and online marketing. SEO Cleanup mainly focuses on SME’s to audit website for various parameters and suggest the most effective solutions to improve ranking and performance of websites.

Some of the services which SEO Cleanup handles include:

Complete website audit, Search Engine Optimization, Competitor study, Landing page optimization, Search Engine friendliness check, Integrating complete SEO elements on the pages, Content evaluation and consultancy, Google Analytics, Google Maps code integration, Including Twitter, Facebook, Linkedin, YouTube pages, Google Webmaster account creation, Blog optimization, E-commerce website optimization, Black hat SEO check, SEM campaign consultancy, Website design & development, Branding services,

[SEO Cleanup] (http://www.seocleanup.com)

offices.address2: 3rd Floor, Prince Plaza, Pantheon Road, Egmore
